# Definitions

### Distinguishable dydas

Husband and wife
Advisor and PhD.Student
First and second author

### Indistinguishable dydas

Twins
Best friends (mutually chosen)
Roomates

# Variability

### Between dyads 

- Time together
- family income

### Within dyads

-Time using the car (only one car)
-Gender (heterosexual couple)

**Same value for each dyad**

### Mixed variable

- Risk factor
- Age
